query.name: getLastSupportCaseOrderedByTwitterId
query.content: SELECT s FROM SupportCase s order by s.externalCaseId desc

query.name: getNonRejectedSupportCases
query.content: SELECT s FROM SupportCase s where s.status != 'Rejected' order by createdDate desc

query.name: getClosedSupportCases
query.content: SELECT s FROM SupportCase s where s.status = 'Closed' order by createdDate desc

query.name: getNonRejectedAndClosed
query.content: SELECT s FROM SupportCase s where s.status = 'Rejected' AND s.status = 'Closed' order by createdDate desc

query.name: getEmployees
query.content: SELECT e FROM OBDEmployee e ORDER by e.id

query.name: getHomeOfficeData
query.content: Select e.homeOffice, Count(*) From OBDEmployee e Group by e.homeOffice Order by e.homeOffice

query.name: countNonCompleted
query.content: SELECT COUNT(o) FROM OBDEmployee o WHERE o.status <> 'Completed'

query.name: getPersonData
query.content: SELECT o FROM OBDPerson o ORDER by o.id

businessObject.description: Number of days that are available to each employee.

query.name: withVacances
query.content: SELECT v FROM VacationAvailable v WHERE v.daysAvailableCounter < 25 ORDER BY v.persistenceId

businessObject.description: An employee vacation request. Possible status are: pending, approved, refused and cancelled.

query.name: findCancellableByEmployeeId
query.content: SELECT l FROM VacationRequest l WHERE l.requesterBonitaBPMId = :requesterBonitaBPMId AND l.startDate > :startDate AND l.status IN('pending', 'approved') ORDER BY l.startDate ASC

queryParameter.name: startDate
queryParameter.description: date is a string in database, use yyyy-mm-dd format

query.name: findCancellableByReviewer
query.content: SELECT l FROM VacationRequest l WHERE l.reviewerBonitaBPMId = :reviewerBonitaBPMId AND l.startDate <= :startDate AND l.returnDate >= :startDate AND l.status IN('pending', 'approved') ORDER BY l.startDate ASC

query.name: findCancelRequest
query.content: SELECT l FROM VacationRequest l WHERE l.status IN('Cancel pending...') ORDER BY l.startDate ASC

query.name: getCountInvoiceId
query.content: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Invoice

query.name: getClosedInvoice
query.content: SELECT i FROM Invoice i where i.status LIKE '%Closed%' order by processInstanceId desc

query.name: getGreaterThan5k
query.content: SELECT i FROM Invoice i WHERE i.invoiceAmount >= 5000 ORDER BY invoiceDate ASC

query.name: getLowerThan5k
query.content: SELECT i FROM Invoice i WHERE i.invoiceAmount <= 5000 ORDER BY invoiceDate ASC

query.name: getOpenInvoices
query.content: SELECT inv FROM Invoice inv where inv.status = 'Level 1 Approved' OR inv.status = 'In Progress' OR inv.status = 'Level 1 Approval' OR inv.status = 'Level 2 Approval' OR inv.status = 'Level 2 Approved' order by processInstanceId desc

query.name: getExpiredInvoices
query.content: SELECT i FROM Invoice i WHERE i.invoiceDeadlineDate < to_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY i.persistenceId ASC
query.description: Search for Invoices with expired deadlines

query.name: getExpiringInvoices
query.content: SELECT i FROM Invoice i WHERE i.invoiceDeadlineDate < :date ORDER BY i.persistenceId ASC

field.name: validationDelay
field.description: validation delay counted in calendar days

query.name: autocompSearch
query.content: SELECT p FROM Provider p WHERE concat(p.name , ' - ', p.city ,' ', p.country) = :qParam ORDER BY p.persistenceId ASC

businessObject.description: Quotation sent to suppliers based on a request

query.name: findFromRequest
query.content: SELECT q FROM Quotation q WHERE q.request.persistenceId = :id

query.name: query
query.content: SELECT a FROM Address a WHERE a.address = :address AND a.address2 = :address2 AND a.postalCode = :postalCode AND a.city = :city AND a.country = :country ORDER BY a.persistenceId ASC

query.name: query
query.content: SELECT c FROM Customer c ORDER BY c.persistenceId DESC

query.name: countForQuery
query.content: SELECT count(c) FROM Customer c

query.name: previousCustomers
query.content: SELECT c FROM Customer c WHERE c.persistenceId != :persistenceId ORDER BY c.name ASC

query.name: registredCustomers
query.content: SELECT c FROM Customer c WHERE c.userId > 0 ORDER BY c.persistenceId ASC

query.name: template
query.content: SELECT d FROM DamageType d WHERE d.template = 1 ORDER BY name ASC
